column6: Language Literacy in Early Childhood Education II
column7: Emphasizes developmentally appropriate practices for the teaching of reading and writing in grades K-2. 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 465. Requires concurrent enrollment in CI 420 and CI 443.
column9: 3 undergraduate hours. 3 graduate hours. Prerequisite: CI 465. Requires concurrent enrollment in CI 420 and CI 443.
